title: Abuse outside of matchmade games
body:
So, lately I've noticed a lot of people abusing in post-match screen, or friending you and unleashing a diatribe of abuse..

Is there anywhere for us to report this kinda thing or anything we can really do about it?

Rito pls

replies.body: tell them to meet u face to face and break their jaw :D
ignore them so if you play with them again and theyre ignored you know theyre toxic :D
Top right, there's this little button labelled "support" that people seem to think is just for show.

There's an in-game report system at the post-match screen . . . 
You say that they abuse in the post-match screen, there you can report.
